coffee

Class Coffee

  • java.lang.Object
    • mainMenu.MenuItem
      • coffee.Coffee
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Customizable

    public class Coffee
extends MenuItem
implements Customizable
    The Coffee class extends from the MenuItem class to give specific details regarding coffee items. Holds information regarding the list of add-ins the coffee has, the size the coffee will be, as well as the end price of having these said properties.
    Author:
    Jah C. Speed, Abe Vitangcol

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> addIns 

      • Fields inherited from class mainMenu.MenuItem

    • Field Detail

      • addIns

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> addIns

    • Constructor Detail

      • Coffee

        public Coffee(java.lang.String size,
              java.lang.String coffee,
              double price,
              int amount)
        Constructor for the coffee class, giving each coffee a size, type of item, the quantity, and the price for the said coffee. Capable of holding information about the add-ons for the coffee.
        Parameters:
        size - The size of the coffee, either small, tall, grande, or venti. coffee The type of item this object is. price The amount of money it costs for this coffee. amount The amount of coffee of this specifications that will be made in one order.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public boolean add(java.lang.Object obj)
        Adds an addIn of the user's choice to the coffee.
        Specified by:
        add in interface Customizable
        Parameters:
        obj - The object to add in to the coffee.
        Returns:
        true if the addition of the addIn was successful, false otherwise.

      • listInitilized

        private void listInitilized()
        Initializes the addIns list to perform addition or removal of addIns for this coffee.

      • remove

        public boolean remove(java.lang.Object obj)
        Removes a said addIn from the current list of addIns for this coffee.
        Specified by:
        remove in interface Customizable
        Parameters:
        obj - The object to remove from the coffee.
        Returns:
        true if the removal of the addIn was successful, false otherwise.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Turns this coffee object into a readable string. Useful for outputting the order onto the screen. Prints it in "Size: (SIZE) | Flavor: (FLAVOR) | Addins: (LIST OF ADDINS) | Quantity: (AMOUNT)" format.
        Overrides:
        toString in class MenuItem
        Returns:
        The coffee order in string format.
